abstract: A lack of cash is stalling the growth of small businesses, All Things D says. On Deck Capital aims to solve this problem and has raised $15 million to that end.
snippet: A lack of cash is stalling the growth of small businesses, All Things D says. On Deck Capital aims to solve this problem and has raised $15 million to that end.
lead_paragraph: A lack of ready cash is stalling the growth of small businesses across the United States, All Things D says. But On Deck Capital, the latest venture capital darling, aims to solve this problem.

headline.main: Raising Money, to Help Other People Raise Money

abstract: BlackRock, the world’s largest asset manager, has awarded its chief executive, Laurence D. Fink, a bonus of nearly $13 million in restricted stock and options for 2010.
snippet: BlackRock, the world’s largest asset manager, has awarded its chief executive, Laurence D. Fink, a bonus of nearly $13 million in restricted stock and options for 2010.
lead_paragraph: BlackRock, the world’s largest asset manager, has awarded nearly $13 million in stock and options to its chief executive, Laurence D. Fink.
